name: Brown-Butter Vinaigrette
keywords: butter, extra virgin olive oil, sherry vinegar, fall
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a small saucepan over medium-high heat until browned but not burned, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and reserve.

In a blender, combine the vinegar, olive oil, shallot and mustard. Blend until smooth. With the motor running, slowly drizzle in the reserved butter and blend until thickened. Season to taste and set aside at room temperature until ready to serve.
